results.description:
The kick off event last time was a great night. Hope those that came really enjoyed it and we're looking forward to more of the same next time. This month, we'll take a brief look at an open source project started by an engineer here at COOKPAD, and attempt to collect some ideas for new open source projects or contributions we can make as a group. This event is for the Tokyo Rails community. Come and join us!

 

19:30 - Doors Open

20:00 - Starting an Open Source project

20:30 - Food, Drinks & Chat

22:00 - Close

 

http://maps.google.com/maps?q=35.639725,139.72213&hl=en&z=15
results.name: COOKPAD on Rails #2

results.description:
Our goal is simply to provide the resources and facilities for everyone interested in Rails in the Tokyo area to meet regularly so that we can collaborate with and learn from each other.

 

COOKPAD sponsors the events and we'll be holding them on the first Thursday of every month at their offices in Shirokanedai.

 

We hope to see you all again on Thursday October 6th 2011 at 7.30pm.

 

Please RSVP for this (and the meetup group if you haven't already) so we know how many folks to expect

 

schedule:

19:30 - Doors Open

20:00 - introduce tokyorails.org project idea

20:15 - Open Mic : anyone have a project to show, or looking for help to start something?

20:30 - Food, Drinks & Chat

22:00 - Close

 

Also, slides and a short recap from last month are here: http://tech.cookpad.com/2011/09/cookpad-on-...




 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

http://maps.google.com/maps?q=35.639725,139...
results.name: TOKYO Rails - 10/6/2011 @ COOKPAD

results.description:
** note: this is on the first Wednesday of the month this time due to the holiday **

 

If you want to get involved in any of the projects, or have ideas, please let us know tokyorails @ gmail.com . send your github id and we'll add you to the organization  https://github.com/tokyorails

 

Please RSVP for this (and the meetup group if you haven't already) so we know how many folks to expect

meta.title: Meetup Events v2
meta.description: Access Meetup events using a group, member, or event id. Events in private groups are available only to authenticated members of those groups. To search events by topic or location, see [Open Events](/meetup_api/docs/2/open_events).
